Module Assignment
Package services

Class CampCommitteeService

java.lang.Object
services.CampCommitteeService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICampCommitteeService
public class CampCommitteeService extends Object implements ICampCommitteeService
The CampCommitteeService class implements the ICampCommitteeService interface and provides methods for managing committee-related camp services. These services aid in the overall committees' desired operations.
